mapper.update:
update user
clan_id = #{clanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

vip = #{vip,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
vip_expires = #{vipExpires,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
